# Online Check PRO - Release notes

## 2023.2.2 - 20.07.2023
* PingCheck: OnPingCompleted has now a "didTimeOut"-parameter
* Updated to Common 2023.2.3

## 2023.2.1 - 29.06.2023
* OnlineCheck: now uses unscaledDeltaTime
* PingCheck: now uses unscaledDeltaTime and caches the hostname
* Threading improved
* Updated to Common 2023.2.2

## 2023.2.0 - 18.06.2023
* Complete code cleanup
* Enums improved
* Updated to Common 2023.2.1

## 2023.1.0 - 26.01.2023
* Support for Unity 2023
* Updated to Common 2023.1.0

## 2022.2.2 - 02.12.2022
* Project cleanup
* Updated to Common 2022.2.2

## 2022.2.1 - 04.11.2022
* Editor integration improved
* "Check for Update..." added to the menu
* Updated to Common 2022.2.1

## 2022.2.0 - 15.08.2022
* Minimal supported version is now Unity 2019.4 or newer
* Updated to Common 2022.2.0

## 2022.1.2 - 30.05.2022
* Fixes for import of packages

## 2022.1.1 - 28.05.2022
* Automatic installation of packages improved
* Editor-folders moved to Scripts
* GetHashCode-method improved
* Updated to Common 2022.1.2

## 2022.1.0 - 24.03.2022
* OnlineCheck: LastCheckRTT and LastCheckRTTMilliseconds added
* CustomCheck improved
* Editor integration improved
* Fixes for namespaces
* "00-Simple_Example" demo scene added
* Updated to Common 2022.1.0

## 2021.2.7 - 30.12.2021
* Updated to Common 2021.3.6

## 2021.2.6 - 18.11.2021
* Updated to Common 2021.3.5

## 2021.2.5 - 11.11.2021
* Check if OnlineCheck/PingCheck/SpeedTest are active before executing methods
* Updated to Common 2021.3.4

## 2021.2.4 - 27.09.2021
* Updated to Common 2021.3.3

## 2021.2.3 - 31.08.2021
* Code cleanup
* Updated to Common 2021.3.1

## 2021.2.2 - 04.06.2021
* Editor improvements
* Updated to Common 2021.2.2

## 2021.2.1 - 15.04.2021
* Updated to Common 2021.2.1

## 2021.2.0 - 14.04.2021
* Updated to Common 2021.2.0

## 2021.1.1 - 25.02.2021
* Updated to Common 2021.1.1

## 2021.1.0 - 04.01.2021
* Support for XBox added
* Demo scenes improved
* Available checks exposed
* URLs updated
* Updated to Common 2021.1.0

## 2020.4.7 - 17.12.2020
* Improved for Unity 2020.2
* Documentation updated
* Updated to Common 2020.4.8

## 2020.4.6 - 14.12.2020
* Planned final release for 2020
* New Youtube video added: https://youtu.be/wlvffOKYfCU
* Updated to Common 2020.4.7

## 2020.4.5 - 09.12.2020
* Updated to Common 2020.4.6

## 2020.4.4 - 30.10.2020
* Improvements for Unity 2019 and newer
* Script execution order changed
* SpeedTestNET-prefab from Editor fixed

## 2020.4.3 - 16.10.2020
* Singletons improved
* Multi-threading improved
* Updated to Common 2020.4.4

## 2020.4.2 - 10.09.2020
* Code clean-up
* Updated to Common 2020.4.3

## 2020.4.1 - 25.08.2020
* Small code improvements
* Updated to Common 2020.4.1

## 2020.4.0 - 11.08.2020
* Big code overhaul: use "Instance" to access the methods and variables
* SpeedTestNET:
  * download and upload speed fixed
  * moved to "3rd party"
* Import of the demo scenes streamlined 
* Minimal version is now Unity 2018.4 and newer
* Updated to Common 2020.4.0

## 2020.3.0 - 02.07.2020
* Unity event "OnStatusChange" added to "OnlineCheck"
* Unity event "OnPingComplete" added to "PingCheck"
* Unity event "OnSpeedTestComplete" added to "SpeedTest" and "SpeedTestNET"
* Updated to Common 2020.3.0

## 2020.2.3 - 17.06.2020
* Demo scenes are now in "Demos.unitypackage" (please install "Assets/Plugins/crosstales/Common/UI.unitypackage" first)
* Scene "SpeedTest" and "SpeedTestNET" updated
* Updated to Common 2020.2.1

## 2020.2.2 - 09.06.2020
* OnlineCheck: "Reset" changed to "ResetObject"
* Code improved

## 2020.2.1 - 24.05.2020
* OnlineCheck, PingCheck, SpeedTest and SpeedTestNET are now working without an object in the scene
* Updated to Common 2020.2.0

## 2020.2.0 - 16.05.2020
* SpeedTestNET added
* Compile defines can now be disabled
* Editor integration improved
* PlayMaker actions improved
* Integration for Unity 2020 improved

## 2020.1.3 - 15.04.2020
* Editor improved
* Updated to Common 2020.1.3

## 2020.1.2 - 05.03.2020
* PingCheck: LastIP and LastHost added
* SpeedTest: LastURL and "url" in callback added
* ReminderCheck removed
* Updated to Common 2020.1.2

## 2020.1.1 - 29.01.2020
* PingCheck added
* SpeedTest added
* NetworkInfo added
* Support for Unity 2020
* Updated to Common 2020.1.1

## 2020.1.0 - 10.01.2020
* asmdef added
* Editor integration improved
* Updated to Common 2020.1.0

## 2019.3.3 - 18.12.2019
* Small code improvements

## 2019.3.2 - 06.12.2019
* Editor integration improved
* Updated to Common 2019.5.4

## 2019.3.1 - 21.11.2019
* Minor code improvements
* Updated to Common 2019.5.3

## 2019.3.0 - 15.10.2019
* Biggest code overhaul since the release 
* Updated to Common 2019.5.1

## 2019.2.2 - 25.09.2019
* ReminderCheck changed
* UpdateCheck is now set to "false" per default (enable it in the configuration)
* Code cleanup

## 2019.2.1 - 05.09.2019
* Code improvements
* Updated to Common 2019.4.1

## 2019.2.0 - 26.07.2019
* Minimal version is now Unity 2017.4 and newer
* Added compatibility with assembly definitions
* Demos: fully qualified access to classes
* Updated to Common 2019.4.0

## 2019.1.4 - 12.05.2019
* ForceWWW added
* Updated to Common 2019.3.1

## 2019.1.3 - 10.04.2019
* Editor improvements
* Updated to Common 2019.2.5

## 2019.1.2 - 12.03.2019
* PlayMaker-actions improved
* Editor improved
* Updated to Common 2019.2.3

## 2019.1.1 - 07.02.2019
* UnityWebRequest caching disabled
* Updated to Common 2019.2.0

## 2019.1.0 - 14.01.2019
* Various improvements and fixes
* Updated to Common 2019.1.0

## 2018.4.0 - 01.11.2018
* OnlineCheck.cs:
   * "Delay" added
   * "Timeout"-field added to set the timeout for every check
   * "RefreshYield" added
* Updated to Common 2018.4.0

## 2018.3.1 - 18.10.2018
* Manager: "Reset"-method added
* Proxy: Editor improved
* Fixes for WSA
* Updated to Common 2018.3.1

## 2018.3.0 - 08.10.2018
* Singleton-behaviour for custom root objects improved
* Minimum Unity version is now 5.6
* PlayMaker-package updated
* Common 2018.3.0 added

## 2018.2.2 - 21.09.2018
* Fix: WebRequest-timeout was set too low
* "Custom Check" is now an asset
* Common 2018.2.2 added

## 2018.2.1 - 21.09.2018
* WWW replaced with UnityWebRequest
* OnlineCheck: ensure name is optional (see "Config")
* UpdateCheck: runs in a separate thread
* Common 2018.2.1 added
* Tested with Unity 2018.3

## 2018.2.0 - 20.08.2018
* Compile defines OC_AVAILABLE and OC_UNAVAILABLE added to test your app without connecting/disconnecting the Internet.
* WebGL demo added to store, forum etc.
* Common 2018.2.0 added
* Discord channel added
* Standard version removed

## 1.7.0 - 03.07.2018
* Tests for WSA and Web improved
* New detection methods Google204 and GoogleBlank added
* General code improvements

## 1.6.1 - 06.06.2018
* Editor integration improved
* Official support for Unity 2018.1 & 2018.2

## 1.6.0 - 26.03.2018
* Network reachability added to OnlineCheck.cs:
   * new parameter for "OnOnlineCheckComplete"
   * new property "NetworkReachability"
   * new event "OnNetworkReachabilityChange"
* Demo scenes improved
* Documentation fixed

## 1.5.1 - 21.02.2018
* Fix for WSA
* Official support for Unity 2018
* Common 1.2.5 added

## 1.5.0 - 07.01.2018
* Common 1.2.0 added

## 1.4.3 - 22.12.2017
* Asset moved to "Plugins"
* NYCheck added
* Code cleanup

## 1.4.2 - 04.12.2017
* "Dont Destroy" added to OnlineCheck
* Support for pre Unity 5.3 dropped
 
## 1.4.1 - 22.11.2017
* Checks largely improved
* Small fixes

## 1.4.0 - 13.11.2017
* Compile define symbol "CT_OC" added
* id file added
* Asset path in Editor removed, locate it automatically!
* Editor scripts better organized

## 1.3.2a - 17.10.2017
* PlayMaker actions improved
* Updated for Unity 2017.3

## 1.3.2 - 22.09.2017
* Editor improved
* Documentation updated

## 1.3.1 - 04.09.2017
* ConfigLoader added
* Show configuration on first launch
* Updated for Unity 2017.2

## 1.3.0 - 24.08.2017
* PlayMaker actions added
* Editor-components improved
* DLL version released

## 1.2.0 - 13.08.2017
* Promotion and tutorial videos added
* GAApi added
* General code improvements

## 1.1.1 - 20.07.2017
* Prefab adding fixed
* ManageEndlesMode-script changed from Start to Awake
• Official support for Unity 2017
* Small Editor fixes

## 1.1.0 - 08.07.2017
* Demo scenes improved
* Test-code improved for all Apple-devices
* Small fixes

## 1.0.1 - 16.06.2017
* SetupResources.cs fixed
* GUIDs regenerated
* Internet check improved
* Update check improved
* Reminder added
* Configuration window and menu "Tools" improved:
   * Videos added (incl. promo and tutorials)
   * README added
   * VERSIONS added
   * Social-media buttons added

## 1.0.0 - 24.05.2017
* Production release
